MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL58  postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting properties in Thomas Close, Brynteg and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at the request of emergency services. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.08PM on 20th February 2021.
